docTitle.titlePart:
Magnetic Field Dependence of Molecular Quantum
Beat: Biacetyl

byline.docAuthor:
W. Henke, H. L. Selzle, T. R. Hays,
and E. W. Schlag

titlePage.byline:
Institut für Physikalische Chemie der Technischen Uni-
versität München, Garching

front.div:
The effect of an external magnetic field on the decay of
an excited single rotational state of the l A u electronic state
of biacetyl is observed in a hypersonic jet experiment after
narrow bandwidth laser excitation- The lifetime of the ex-
cited state decreases already at low magnetic fields and
the molecular quantum beat vanishes.
Biacetyl at room temperature shows a broad
